players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I am the detective and I found Diana to be the mafioso. Trust me, she must be eliminated."
Diana: "Charlie, I'm not the mafioso. You're just trying to distract from your own guilt."
Diana: "I'm not the mafioso, I swear. Charlie's accusations are baseless."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I have evidence that Diana is the mafioso. I urge everyone to consider my findings carefully."
